subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Larry Nelson, who won three of golf’s major tournaments, watched his 29-year-old son make two eagles on the final three holes for a 12-under 60 in the Del Webb Father-Son Challenge in Orlando, Fla. Larry and Josh Nelson had a one-shot lead over David Duval and stepson Deano Karavites.
